Betting.priceCallback (/unique_contracts/0xe75a60da4bad89b84d10a7ab8e28f9ed7ba22401.sol#137-171) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(! chronus.race_end) (/unique_contracts/0xe75a60da4bad89b84d10a7ab8e28f9ed7ba22401.sol#140)
	- now >= chronus.starting_time + chronus.race_duration + 3600 (/unique_contracts/0xe75a60da4bad89b84d10a7ab8e28f9ed7ba22401.sol#152-168)
	- now >= chronus.starting_time + chronus.betting_duration + 3600 (/unique_contracts/0xe75a60da4bad89b84d10a7ab8e28f9ed7ba22401.sol#144-150)

Betting.refund (/unique_contracts/0xe75a60da4bad89b84d10a7ab8e28f9ed7ba22401.sol#332-339) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)((chronus.betting_open && ! chronus.race_start) || (chronus.race_start && ! chronus.race_end)) (/unique_contracts/0xe75a60da4bad89b84d10a7ab8e28f9ed7ba22401.sol#336-337)
	- require(bool)(now > chronus.starting_time + chronus.race_duration) (/unique_contracts/0xe75a60da4bad89b84d10a7ab8e28f9ed7ba22401.sol#335-336)

Betting.recovery (/unique_contracts/0xe75a60da4bad89b84d10a7ab8e28f9ed7ba22401.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)((chronus.race_end && now > chronus.starting_time + chronus.race_duration + (2592000)) || (chronus.voided_bet && now > chronus.voided_timestamp + (2592000))) (/unique_contracts/0xe75a60da4bad89b84d10a7ab8e28f9ed7ba22401.sol)

elements.expression: require(bool)((chronus.race_end && now > chronus.starting_time + chronus.race_duration + (2592000)) || (chronus.voided_bet && now > chronus.voided_timestamp + (2592000)))

analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xe75a60da4bad89b84d10a7ab8e28f9ed7ba22401.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_contracts/0xe75a60da4bad89b84d10a7ab8e28f9ed7ba22401.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Betting.changeOwnership (/unique_contracts/0xe75a60da4bad89b84d10a7ab8e28f9ed7ba22401.sol#136) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'coin_pointer' of Betting.priceCallback (/unique_contracts/0xe75a60da4bad89b84d10a7ab8e28f9ed7ba22401.sol#138) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_bettingDuration' of Betting.setupRace (/unique_contracts/0xe75a60da4bad89b84d10a7ab8e28f9ed7ba22401.sol#190-191) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_raceDuration' of Betting.setupRace (/unique_contracts/0xe75a60da4bad89b84d10a7ab8e28f9ed7ba22401.sol#191) is not in mixedCase
